sentence.Network_en: The targets would not be achieved unless other departments showed equal commitment.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非其他部门同样努力，否则这些目标无法达成。

sentence.Network_en: Training is worthless unless there is proof that it works.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非能证明训练有效，否则就是白搭。

sentence.Network_en: The South African mailboat arrived on Friday mornings unless bad weather intervened.
sentence.Network_cn: 除非受恶劣天气干扰，南非邮船一般在星期五上午抵达。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 老雷斯带领着动物们去寻找新的家园并留给了Vansler一个词“除非(unless)”，从此Vansler的余生就在懊悔从度过。并且每天都在思考老雷斯的话“除非”什么，然而却一直没有得.
高中英语新课程标准词汇表 ... unknown a. 不知道的 unless conj. 如果不，除非 unlike prep. 不像，和……不同.
4级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... university n. 大学 unless conj. 除非，如果不，若不 unlike   prep. 不像，和…不同.
英语语法4_爱问知识人 ... A：when 当...时 ， 什么时候 B：unless 除非，除……外 D：until 直到...为止.

list.abs: you will forget my number unless you write it down ., 你会忘记我的电话号码 , 除非你把它写下来.
you will gain flesh unless you take more exercises ., 如果你不多作运动 , 就会发胖.
航运术语汇编 ... ULTIMO,LAST MONTH 上月的 UNLESS USED 除非使用 usual conditions 通常情况下.
...unless caused by …除非有……引起除非由……引起unless general 除非共同海损unless otherwise directed 除非另有指示
unleaded gasoline 无铅汽油unless clause 除非条款unless lease 除非…租赁

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from on or in (assimilated through lack of stress to un-) + less

entry.tran: 除非；若不；除非在…的时候
entry.def: You use unless to introduce the only circumstances in which an event you are mentioning will not take place or in which a statement you are making is not true.

example.ex: Unless you are trying to lose weight to please yourself, it's going to be tough to keep your motivation level high...
example.tran: 除非减肥是为了悦已，否则很难保持积极性。

example.ex: We cannot understand disease unless we understand the person who has the disease...
example.tran: 若不了解患者我们就不能了解疾病。

auth_sentence.content: Don't offer advice unless they ask for it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't offer advice unless they ask for it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't offer advice unless they ask for it.

auth_sentence.content: Never pick a leveret up unless it is injured.
auth_sentence.res_content: Never pick a leveret up unless it is injured.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Never pick a leveret up unless it is injured.

auth_sentence.content: Fishing cannot survive unless people buy the fish.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fishing cannot survive unless people buy the fish.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fishing cannot survive unless people buy the fish.

Sentence.sentence: We are both frequent theater-goers," Aaron explains, " and I'll gladly pay for two tickets, just to have pass company it plays in concerts , but she won't go anywhere unless she can pay her own way

Almost every child, on the first day he sets foot in a school building, is smarter, more curious, less afraid of what he doesn't know, better at finding and figuring things out, more confident, resourceful (机敏的), persistent and independent than he will ever be again in his schooling – or, unless he is very unusual and very lucky, for the rest of his life.
University officials say that they have no plans to track their students (and Apple said it would not be possible unless students give their permissio.

sentences.en: You will fail unless you work hard.
sentences.cn: 如果你不积极工作, 就会失败。

sentences.en: Let's have dinner out — unless you are too tired.
sentences.cn: 咱们出去吃饭吧——除非你太累了。

sentences.en: Substances have no tendency to expand unless (they are) heated.
sentences.cn: 除非受热, 物质不会有膨胀的倾向。

sentences.en: I will be very angry unless you have already spoken to her.
sentences.cn: 除非你已经对她说过了, 否则我会很生气。

sentences.en: Don't ask me to explain unless you really don't understand.
sentences.cn: 不要叫我解释, 除非你真的不懂。

sentences.en: Unless paying by credit card, please pay in cash.
sentences.cn: 如果不用信用卡付账, 就请付现金。

jushi.english: Don't ask me to explain unless you really don't understand.
jushi.chinese: 不要叫我解释,除非你真的不懂。

jushi.english: I will be very angry unless you have already spoken to her.
jushi.chinese: 除非你已经对她说过了,否则我会很生气。

jushi.english: I won't write unless he writes first.
jushi.chinese: 除非他先写信,否则我就不写。
